translate.dit: （轮船、飞机等上面的）全体工作人员

values: （轮船、飞机等上面的）全体工作人员；工作团队；赛艇队；（赛船的）划船队员；划船队；一群人；一伙人；一帮人；（有共同特征或目标的）团体；（一起演出或活动的）表演团队；（一般指）工作人员；技术人员团队
配备船员；当船员；为（飞机、船只等）配备工作人员

synonym.mean: 队，组；全体人员，全体船员

word_group.brief_definition: 水手领；圆领；水手领针织套衫
电视摄制组；电视台工作人员；电视台人员
摄制组；摄制人员；摄影队
电视摄制组；电视节目摄制组；电视工作人员
建设船员；施工人员；施工队
救护人员；救护队员；医护人员
地勤组长；后勤班长；人员负责人
潜艇船员；潜水艇船员；潜水艇队员
清理人员；清洁队；清洁工

bilingual.target: 全体船员都接受了严格的训练。
全体船员庆祝他们的成功航行。

bilingual.source: The crew worked seamlessly in the emergency.
bilingual.target: 全体船员在紧急情况下合作无间。

bilingual.source: The crew gathered on the deck for a meeting.
bilingual.target: 全体船员在甲板上集合开会。

bilingual.source: The crew acted very bravely during the storm.
bilingual.target: 全体船员在暴风雨中表现得非常勇敢。

bilingual.source: The crew is preparing the ship for departure.
bilingual.target: 全体船员正在准备船只出发。

bilingual.source: The crew members were all experienced sailors.
bilingual.target: 全体船员都是经验丰富的水手。

bilingual.source: The captain was pleased with the crew's performance.
bilingual.target: 船长对全体船员的表现感到满意。

bilingual.source: The crew worked tirelessly to ensure the ship's safety.
bilingual.target: 全体船员不知疲倦地工作以确保船只的安全。

bilingual.source: The captain gave orders to the crew to prepare for departure.
bilingual.target: 船长向全体船员下达了准备出发的命令。

list.abstract: crew（ [kruː]），英语单词，作名词为全体船员；全体机组人员；全体乘务员。作动词为给…配备船员；当船员。短语搭配有flight crew（空勤人员）。例句为“The crew did a tremendous job.（全体人员工作出色。）” crew相关近义词有team、group。

yingyinNormal.en: Sir, my crew was just following my orders.
yingyinNormal.zh: 长官，我的船员只是听从我的命令罢了。

yingyinNormal.en: How's our ship? Out of danger. You saved the crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 飞船怎么样了? 脱离危险了，你救了所有人。

yingyinNormal.en: The S.T.R.I.K.E and Insight crew are Hydra as well.
yingyinNormal.zh: 特战队和洞察计划团队也是。

yingyinNormal.en: But, if something goes wrong. Then, we lose the crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不过，如果出了问题。那么，我们就会失去整个小队。

yingyinNormal.en: As does your Vulcan crew member, isn't that right, Spock?
yingyinNormal.zh: 就像你的维肯星船员一样，对吗，史波克？

yingyinNormal.en: I'm going to make this very simple for you. Captain. Your crew for my crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我长话短说吧，舰长，你的船员换我的伙伴。

yingyinNormal.en: Khan and his crew were condemned to death as war criminals.
yingyinNormal.zh: 可汗和他的同伴是战争罪犯，被判处了死刑。

yingyinNormal.en: No. It had to have been someone else, someone from your crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，肯定是其他人，你们那伙人中的一员。

yingyinNormal.en: How was your prom? Did you go? No, but I was on clean-up crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你当年的舞会如何？你去了吗？没，但我去打扫了。

yingyinNormal.en: Mr. Spock, give me my crew. And what will you do when you get them?
yingyinNormal.zh: 史波克先生，把我的伙伴还给我。然后你会怎样?

yingyinNormal.en: We're here for security and drone maintenance. We're the mop-up crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们在这里负责保卫工作和维修无人机。我们负责收拾烂摊子。

yingyinNormal.en: No, no. If Watney is really alive, we don't want the ARES 3 crew to know.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，不，如果沃特尼真的活着，我们不要让阿瑞斯3号成员知道。

yingyinNormal.en: Where is he? I am certain he is probably out with his usual crew of cut-ups.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他去哪儿了？我相信他一定和他的小伙伴一起出去了。

yingyinNormal.en: Well, I did it. I told my crew at the restaurant that I'm heading off to Tulsa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 好了，我说了。我告诉餐厅的同事我要搬到土尔沙了。

yingyinNormal.en: Then if yours holds, I will have no choice but to kill you and your entire crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果你们还不肯听话，我别无选择，只好杀了你和你的船员。

yingyinNormal.en: Marcus took my crew from me. You are a murderer! He used my friends to control me.
yingyinNormal.zh: 马库斯带走了我的人，你是个杀人犯！他利用我的朋友来控制我。

yingyinNormal.en: I think you already know what I'm gonna do. Good. But, it'll be my way. And my crew.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想你已经知道我会怎么做了。很好。但是，我要用我的方式，还有我自己的人。

yingyinNormal.en: You gonna take me back to the Has-Been Crew? Carve me up around a fire? Very tribal.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是想把我带回到那些老队员面前？围着篝火把我撕碎？就像原始部落。

yingyinNormal.en: Oh, there's a video message. It's address to the whole crew. Play it. Come on, guys.
yingyinNormal.zh: 哦，有个视频信息是，是发给全队的。播放来一下, 各位。

yingyinNormal.en: The bodies of the air crew were found less than 24 hours after they landed in Damascus.
yingyinNormal.zh: 在飞机降落于大马士革之后不到24小时，我们就找到了机组人员的尸体。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 全体乘务员; 全体船员

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: Hire a personal stylist, or use the free styling service of a store like J. <highlight>Crew</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 聘请私人造型师，或者使用杰·克鲁之类的商店的免费造型服务。

sense_info_list.zh: 全体乘务员; 全体船员

exam_freq_info.chinese: 全体船员/机务人员; 全体工作人员

sense_info_list.en: a group of people working together
sense_info_list.zh: (充当/担任)全体船员/机务人员/工作人员

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Crews</highlight> had the fire under control in about 45 minutes and managed to contain the fire to its point of origin.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 全体工作人员在大约45分钟内控制住了火势，并设法将火势控制在它的源头。

examination_example.sentence: Each ship was coal-powered by several boilers constantly kept running by exhausted <highlight>crews</highlight> below deck.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每艘船都由几个锅炉提供煤动力，这些锅炉由甲板下疲惫的船员持续运行。

examination_example.sentence: Both he and a <highlight>crew</highlight> member are being investigated for unintentional murder and exposing people to danger, according to police.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 据警方称，他和一名机组人员都因无意谋杀和将人置于危险之中而正在接受调查。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people working together

examination_example.sentence: The ship was intended to take a small <highlight>crew</highlight> of seamen and scientists to the southernmost shore of Antarctica's Weddell Sea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这艘打算载着一小队水手以及27名科学家，前往南极洲威德尔海的最南端海岸。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: a group of people working together

examination_example.sentence: Before long, a camera <highlight>crew</highlight> from television’s Today Show came into their yard.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不久，电视《今日秀》的一个摄制组来到他们的院子里。

examination_example.sentence: They usually use sleeping bags located in small <highlight>crew</highlight> cabins (乘员舱).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们通常使用位于小船员舱的睡袋。

examination_example.sentence: Each <highlight>crew</highlight> cabin is just big enough for one person.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 每个船员舱刚好够一个人住。

textTranslate.result: （轮船、飞机等上面的）全体工作人员
